description:
PhantomBot is a Twitch chat bot powered by Java.
PhantomBot has many modern features out of the box such as a built-in webpanel, enhanced moderation, games, a point system, raffles, custom commands, a music player, and more! PhantomBot can also be integrated with many services such as Discord, Twitter, TipeeeStream, StreamLabs and StreamElements!

## Package parameters

- `/InstallDir`  - Set install location
summary: PhantomBot is an actively developed open source interactive Twitch bot with a vibrant community that provides entertainment and moderation for your channel, allowing you to focus on what matters the most to you - your game and your viewers.
author: BrandenB phantomindex Zackery
